title: Nike Men's Sportswear Club Joggers
description: NIKE MEN'S JOGGERS: Set yourself up with plush comfort without the bulk. The men's jogger sweatpants feature an elastic waistband and ankle cuffs for a clean look.
FLEECE LINED: Crafted with brushed-back fleece, the Nike jogger pants for men are made of cotton and polyester with a soft, warm feel against the skin during play.
SLIM WAISTBAND: The slim waistband and open-hem design create a laid-back look. The Nike joggers have a ribbed waistband and ankle cuffs, so you can show off your sneakers.
POCKETS: Open side pockets and a back pocket with snap-button closure offer convenient storage. The regular fit men's jogger pants are slim at the hip and relaxed through the legs.
MEN'S SWEATPANTS: Machine wash, imported, inner layer fabric: 80% cotton/20% polyester, outer layer fabric: 100% cotton, Nike logo embroidered on left hip.
Nike Sportswear Men’s Jogger Sweatpant set you up with warmth without the bulk. Crafted with soft fleece fabric, it features an updated, slim waistband and cuffs for a clean look.
